Module edu.uoc.nertia
Package edu.uoc.nertia.view.gui

Class PlayController

java.lang.Object
edu.uoc.nertia.view.gui.PlayController
public class PlayController extends Object
Class that controls the interaction in the Play view.
Author:
David García-Solórzano

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize() throws IOException, LevelException
      Initializes the controller class. This method is automatically called after the fxml file has been loaded.
      Throws:
      IOException - When there is a problem while loading the game.
      LevelException - When there is a problem while loading a new level.

    • update

      private void update() throws LevelException
      Updates the status of the level (i.e. the flow of the game). It also paints the game in the GUI.
      Throws:
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.

    • paint

      private void paint()
      Paints the level in the GUI.

    • onKeyReleased

      public void onKeyReleased(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event) throws LevelException, IOException
      Capture the keyboard's keys and moves the player accordingly. Hint:
      • KeyCode.LEFT = its ordinal number is 16
      • KeyCode.UP = 17
      • KeyCode.RIGHT = 18
      • KeyCode.DOWN = 19
      Parameters:
      event - Object with all the data of the key has been released by the player.
      Throws:
      LevelException - When there is a problem while updating the level.
      IOException - When there is a problem while creating the GameOver view.

    • onUndo

      private void onUndo() throws LevelException
      Undo the last move.
      Throws:
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.

    • onReload

      private void onReload() throws LevelException
      Reloads the current level of the game.
      Throws:
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.
